summary: A lonely mother begins receiving romantic e-mails from a secret admirer, unaware that this perfect man is really a creation of her daughter who is trying to cheer her up.
cast: Hilary Duff|Heather Locklear|Chris Noth|Mike O'Malley|Ben Feldman|Vanessa Lengies|Caroline Rhea|Kym Whitley|Aria Wallace|Carson Kressley|Michelle Nolden|Maggie Castle|Gerry Mendicino|James McGowan|Philip Akin|Jeff Lumby|Monique Mojica|Marvin Kaye|Eldridge Hyndman|Sean H.A. Gallagher|Jung-Yul Kim|Dennis DeYoung|John Blasucci|Matthew DeYoung|Thomas Dziallo|Allison Horton|Ed Fielding|Eugene Oleksiuk|Richard Partington|Hazel Gorin|Martin Doyle|Laura Robinson|Sharise Mortfield|Evelyn Kaye|Len Wagner|Jerry Azzopardi|Sue Parker|Curtis Fletcher|Marc Minardi|Ashley Newbrough|Rick Cordeiro|Randy William Currie|Tammy Fitzgerald|Anthony Furey|Michael Sercerchi|Ashley Townsend|Greg White
title: El hombre perfecto
